senses.sense_definition: An edible freshwater armored catfish (Hoplosternum littorale) native to northern South America, often found in swamps and used in local cuisine.

examples.text: The fishermen returned from the swamp with a bucket full of fresh <w>hassar</w> for the market.
She decided to cook a traditional <w>hassar</w> curry with coconut milk and spices for dinner.
